quotes.quote: There is a pleasure in being mad, which none but madmen know.
It's not about being mad at everything. It's about being really mad at the right things.
Being mad is even pleasant. But only a madman understands that.
You see all of us go through the same doubts. We are afraid of being mad; unfortunately for us, of course, all of us are already mad.
Resisting madness is the maddest way of being mad.
In a mad world, only the mad are sane.
The worst of madmen is a saint run mad.
Life is too short to be mad for too long.
The man who never dreams, goes slowly mad.
Mad desire, when it has the most, longs for more.
Madmen always think it's the others who are mad.
The sane are madder than we think, the mad saner.
The madman who knows that he is mad is close to sanity.
When you are mad at yourself, you are mad at everybody.
A mad person sees what isn't there; A visionary sees what isn't there yet.
Even the company of the mad was better than the company of the dead.
When a mad man walks naked, it is his kinsmen who feel shame, not himself.
There are worse things than being mad.
Women who are inclined to write poetry at all are inspired by being mad at something.
Most men are within a finger's breadth of being mad.
A mad man sees what he sees.
Don't get mad except on purpose.
Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.
Not to be mad is another form of madness
You have to be mad in the language you're mad in.
You can choose to be mad in a negative way where it fuels you to do mean, hateful things, or you can let your madness fuel your art and channel it in a positive way.
When you get mad, it's the time you lose.
In a mad world, it is the mad who are sane.
